openpibo.modules.oled.digitalio module¶

digitalio - Digital input and output control¶

See CircuitPython:digitalio in CircuitPython for more details. * Author(s): cefn

class openpibo.modules.oled.digitalio.DigitalInOut(pin)¶

기반 클래스: openpibo.modules.oled.util.ContextManaged

Get or Set the Digital Pin Direction

switch_to_input(pull=None)¶

Switch the Digital Pin Mode to Input

switch_to_output(value=False, drive_mode=openpibo.modules.oled.digitalio.DriveMode.PUSH_PULL)¶

Switch the Digital Pin Mode to Output

property value¶

Get or Set the Digital Pin Value
